channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report E-2025020250
item.description:
Report E-2025020250

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-18
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-Logistics contacted ERTS regarding a leaking drum containing hazardous material, Hot Tank Stripper. A contractor dispatched and observed an estimated 1-cup of product released onto the wooden trailer floor and concrete dock floor in a 12’ x 8.5’ area as a result of improper packaging (exterior corrosion). The contractor overpacked the damaged, leaking drum into one 95-gallon DF for waste disposal. Soda ash was applied to the release and the impacted pallet and both were containerized into one 55-gallon DF for waste disposal. XPO will manage all waste created from the response. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were involved in this incident.

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0

  • Description: WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO TRAILER, PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2025020928
item.description:
Report X-2025020928

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-06
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WET PACKAGE FOUND, BROUGHT TO DMP PROCESSING AREA. DURING PROCESSING PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKED ON BY UNKNOWN SUBSTANCE - NO ORIGIN FOUND. CONTENTS WERE COMPRESSED GAS CYLINDERS. PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO HAVE A DELIBERATLY COVERED LTD QTY GND MARKING.
